Hawke’s Bay’s ‘phantom’ race day: The fashion, music, punting will go on - without the horses https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bays-phantom-race-day-the-fashion-music-punting-will-go-on-without-the-horses/ JBLUNRBNUBB5FMBIVLGKFNXD6A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bays-phantom-race-day-the-fashion-music-punting-will-go-on-without-the-horses/ JBLUNRBNUBB5FMBIVLGKFNXD6A/ Doug Laing'Obviously there are some questions that have to be answered.' Wed, 09 Oct 2024 17:10:00 +0000 The Fashion in the Field competition attracts the punters from far and wide, last year including Sam West, from Auckland. A fashion contest and the Punter of the Year are still on the programme at Hawke's Bay Racing's phantom race day in Hastings on Saturday, although the horse racing will be in Hamilton. Photo / NZME.
